instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2494: What is 820-2494? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message:
Hi all, now i have this problem...

This imac has full black screen. i can see a screen get power but black screen 
Board has all 4 LED on.
I replaced the Graphic card, Screen, LCD power board, LCD cable, Main power board with known working parts, but still the same. So I asume this is a board issue as other than the board I have replaced everything to check. 

with external monitor i have image and i can install macOSX catalina without problems, can work ethernet, usb, wifi, all parts.

any ideas? thanks for all

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message:
Any history fault available?
Missing both image and backlight for sure?

Do you get voltage at pins 28 &29 of J9002?

Check continuity for all coils and resistors in "LCD MUX & CHOKES" page from schematic.

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message:
any problem, always ok

only image, I have backlight

pin28= 3,3v (with image in external monitor)
ping29= 3,3v (same)

yes I have continuity in <RESISTOR>R8900</RESISTOR>,01,02....57 but I don't have in L8904 and L8954 (is normal) thanks

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message: Change L8904/54 then; or bypass them with tiny wires.

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message: hi again, I change this and now I have continuity but I don't have image... :(

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message:
Check again all components in that page.
Don't forget <RESISTOR>R8980</RESISTOR>/1 and RP8980.
Also check continuity for all lines until video connector.

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message:
I check this again <RESISTOR>R8980</RESISTOR>/1 continuity perfect

RP8980 i don't have this item

[ATTACH type="full"]61228[/ATTACH]

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message:
"RP8980 i don't have this item"
You can't locate it on the board, or is ripped off?

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message:
I sent you a photo of the part of the board so that you could see it yourself, I think that this version of the board does not have those components

The computer was working fine until the graphics card broke. That's why I think that this version of the board doesn't need that component.

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message: Excuse me, I have been able to see another motherboard of this model and if you have them, but it is the version with graphics included (without card slot)

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message:
"I sent you a photo of the part of the board so that you could see it yourself"
As per boardview, RP8980 is not in that area; just few centimeters away.
The boardview I'm looking at, has the MXM connector.

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message: omg !! 8980 ... In my head I had 8900... a thousand apologies I'm very stupid

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message: ok friend yes I have continuity in all points 3,4 with <CHIP>U8750</CHIP> and J9002 and points 1,2 with <RESISTOR>R8980</RESISTOR>/1

threads.title: imac 21.5 2009 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2494</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A black screen
threads.message: Did you check if all mentioned resistors and coils have internal continuity?
